ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Stun/root
ygData.msgSnippet: Level 23 Bard here.  I was killing lizzies in Rathe Mtns last night to get skels to spawn.  They started running at 50% health.  With chains they walked until
ygData.messageBody:
Level 23 Bard here. I was killing lizzies in Rathe Mtns last night to get
skels to spawn. They started running at 50% health. With chains they
walked until 25% health, then stood.

Tomerrilin

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 09, 2000 1:22 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Stun/root


From: <kim@...>

On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> so Broon used to stop running at 25% with chain/fear, but then a little
> higher in level it was at 50%? guess i should know better than to dispute
> John! ;)

Yeah, that's how I remember it. Bear in mind this was a long
time ago, so I wouldn't discount my memory being faulty.
Easiest way to test it would probably be to have a L23ish bard
Chain something at 40% while you fear it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
